titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R.5410) to provide for the registration of foreign interests in United States property, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1048.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 246 - 163 (Record Vote No: 427).

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5410 (registration of foreign interests in U.S. property).
